Testimonios.title: Stories that Inspire and Transform üå±‚ú®
intro: Each story proves that talent flourishes when combined with purpose, guidance and a growth mindset.
Discover how I've supported young professionals, leaders and tech teams to unlock their potential, strengthen their leadership and generate real impact in their projects and careers.

metrics.text: Experience valued for its closeness, clarity and real results. Each session leaves applicable learnings and visible change in how you think and act.
90% of those who have worked with me feel a tangible evolution in their mindset and professional performance.
Young tech professionals, career changers and team leaders who now work with more purpose, focus and confidence.

newsletter.title: Subscribe
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for tips, inspiration and more.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Accompany tech professionals on their journey of self-discovery and growth. Create safe spaces where they can discover their purpose, strengthen their confidence and transform their talent into something that truly matters.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: That every person who walks with me not only grows professionally, but becomes someone who inspires genuine change in their environment. Build a more human, conscious and purposeful tech community.

bottom.mantra: Be authentic, inspire young tech talents and build with faith a legacy with soul.

Pilares.title: The 4 pillars of the HugoTech experience

items.title: Self-awareness and personal development
items.description: Real change starts within. We work on your confidence, effective communication, emotional intelligence and empathy so you lead from authenticity. We explore your values, strengths and growth areas because when you know yourself deeply, you make better decisions in your tech career.

items.title: Growth mindset (vs. burnout)
items.description: We stop glorifying exhaustion. Together we build a sustainable tech career where success doesn't drain you. With anti-burnout tools, conscious energy management, clear purpose and growth mindset applied daily. Because your well-being is the foundation of your best performance.

items.title: Agile leadership and high-performance teams
items.description: Develop your ability to influence positively, create psychological safety and build extraordinary teams that deliver with excellence. With Management 3.0, agile facilitation, applied coaching and collaborative culture. We lead from trust and authentic vulnerability, not from fear or technical ego.

items.title: Purpose + Tech Strategy
items.description: We create your personalized roadmap that connects your essence with concrete action. Backend, frontend, fullstack, mobile, QA, UX/UI, database, DevOps, AI, RPA, Product Owner, Scrum Master, marketing tech, tech lead... we decide together your next step based on your values and professional goals. The best technology is built by people who know themselves and act from their purpose.

paragraphs.p1: I'm Hugo Casanova. ICF Professional Coach, Tech Mentor & Agile Leader with 18+ years supporting talents at the moment where confusion transforms into clarity, fear into action, and talent into purpose.
paragraphs.p2: Real challenges aren't just technical. I've seen brilliant developers struggling with low confidence, communication, introversion, or simply disconnected from their purpose. Transformation doesn't start in code, it starts in the being.

vulnerability.text: At 35 I decided to pause and ask myself: What's all this for? That desire to be a better person, to heal and grow led me to coaching to <highlight2>lead from the human side, not just the technical</highlight2>.

items.title: Transformation from the BEING
items.description: I don't just teach frameworks. I accompany you to discover who you are, connect with your purpose and transform from within. Because when you know yourself, you decide better.

items.title: Sustainable Tech Career (Anti-Burnout)
items.description: We build a career where success doesn't drain you. With well-being, purpose clarity and growth mindset. Without glorifying exhaustion.

items.title: Lead with Humanity, not just Code
items.description: We create teams where vulnerability is strength. Based on psychological safety, authentic trust and real conversations, not fear or technical ego.

paragraphs.p1: Don't worry, I'm here to guide you. This is your moment to pause, look at where you're heading and decide how you want to grow.
paragraphs.p2: In our session, I'll help you clarify your goals, understand your strengths and create your next step with purpose. Whether you're starting in tech or want to redesign your path, we'll co-create a clear and realistic plan.

reminder.title: Remember:
reminder.text: 1-on-1 sessions are completely free. This is a pressure-free space, with no hidden agenda. Just you, your questions and honest support.

PorQueGratuito.title: Why are 1:1 sessions free? üíö
PorQueGratuito.intro: Because I believe in giving back to the world what life gave me: knowledge, opportunities and faith.

quote.text: If today I can guide someone, it's because <highlight1>others lifted me up when I needed it most</highlight1>. I've been at the bottom of burnout, questioned everything. Those moments taught me that <highlight2>vulnerability is strength</highlight2>. That's why sessions are free: <highlight3>to give back what life gave me when I was lost</highlight3>.
quote.author: Hugo Casanova

mentoriaCard.subtitle: Purpose coaching + Tech mentoring. Free.
mentoriaCard.p1: Imposter syndrome? Introversion holding you back? Stuck without knowing which path to take? You're not alone. Our 1:1 sessions (no cost) combine human development with tech strategy to transform your confidence and professional clarity.
resultsItems: Clarity about your purpose and next steps in tech
Human skills: confidence, communication, emotional intelligence
Personalized roadmap based on your profile
mentoriaCard.note: 100% free. No fine print. Just honest conversation.

filosofiaCard.title: My Philosophy üå±
filosofiaCard.subtitle: First the being, then the doing. Real transformation starts within.
filosofiaCard.p1: HugoTech was born to be a space where talent meets purpose, the technical with the human, without economic barriers. Just honest conversations that transform from within.
resultsItems: Innovation begins within people, not in code
First the being transforms, then the doing makes sense
Results come as a natural consequence
filosofiaCard.note: B2B sessions for companies do have a cost, because they require structure, follow-up and measurable results. But the heart of HugoTech will always be free.

Inicio.chipLabel: Innovation with Soul ‚Ä¢ Tech with Purpose
Inicio.title: Your tech career is more than code. Discover who you are beyond the keyboard
Inicio.subtitle: It's not just about learning the next framework. It's about knowing yourself, connecting with your purpose and building with authenticity.
Inicio.mantra: Be authentic, inspire young tech talents and build with faith a legacy with soul.

paragraphs.p1: At HugoTech, I accompany tech talents like you. I combine tech mentoring with self-awareness coaching and human development. We work on your confidence, communication, emotional intelligence, purpose and growth mindset. Free. 1-on-1. No filters.
paragraphs.p2: AI boosts your efficiency, but your empathy, creativity and leadership are irreplaceable. I prepare you to lead conscious digital transformation, avoiding burnout and building a sustainable career that energizes you every morning.

leader.title: üß† Reprogram your mindset
leader.description: You're not broken. You just learned patterns that no longer serve you. We're going to reset your way of thinking and trust yourself again.

talent.title: ÔøΩÔ∏è Reclaim your voice and leadership
talent.description: How long has it been since you said what you really think? Your authenticity is your greatest power. Let's awaken it.

antiBurnout.title: ÔøΩ Contribute with purpose, not inertia
antiBurnout.description: You're not here just to execute. You're here to leave your mark. Let your work reflect you, not dim you.

HabilidadesBlandas.title: Do you identify with any of these challenges?
HabilidadesBlandas.subtitle: They're not mistakes. They're opportunities to grow together.
HabilidadesBlandas.intro: Many brilliant tech talents face these challenges. In our 1-on-1 sessions, we work from the root:

skills.text: Fear of failing or breaking something in production
You feel nobody sees your work
Fear of speaking up in meetings
No clear purpose or career path
You avoid conflict at all costs
Don't know how to give or receive feedback healthily
Don't know what comes after the technical role

HabilidadesBlandas.quote: When a person finds themselves, everything they build makes sense.

miguel.quote: You helped me in my professional career, in feeling like part of a family in a work team, to have more confidence in my abilities and to be better every day at a professional level.

intro.p1: Tech talent (Gen Z and Millennials) doesn't just seek a good salary; they seek impact, purpose and human leadership. They'll leave your company for a bad culture, not for a bad 'framework'.
intro.p2: Let's stop managing 'resources'. Let's start leading humans. Through agile leadership workshops, executive coaching and culture programs, I transform your tech team into an unstoppable, innovative and, above all, human force.

CCCausa.title: Coaching with a Cause üåçüíö
CCCausa.subtitle: Your growth also creates impact in the world.

content.p1: All 1-on-1 sessions are 100% free. They always will be. No fine print, no hidden agenda. Just honest conversations that transform.
bullets: Individual mentoring will always be free as my way of giving back what life gave me.
If I offer additional paid programs in the future, a significant portion will be dedicated to social causes focused on tech education and community well-being.
content.p2: Because I believe true success is measured in transformed lives, not just generated revenue.

invite.pBold: The real investment is always in people
invite.p: Your personal growth creates a multiplier effect: when you find your purpose, your impact reaches many others.

images.mainAlt: Portrait of Hugo Casanova, mentor and tech coach

badges.adoption: Your session can help from rescued puppies to cleaning beaches or planting trees.
badges.support: My dream: your growth funds evolving causes. Tomorrow tech scholarships, later what the world needs.

hero.title: I was also <highlight>searching for my north star</highlight>
hero.subtitle: 18+ years building tech, teams and conscious leaders
hero.description: Today I know that talent without purpose is potential without direction. And that the best transformations begin with a single honest conversation.

purpose.title: What I learned along the way
purpose.quote: Purpose doesn't appear in a dashboard. It's discovered in honest conversations.
purpose.intro: At 40 years old, after necessary pauses and uncomfortable questions, I understood something: I wasn't alone. There were thousands of tech professionals feeling the same. Talented in code, searching for purpose.
purpose.conclusion: That's where my north star was born: Be authentic (no corporate poses), accompany those who come behind, and build with soul where the human matters as much as the code.
purpose.mission: I don't want you to wait years to ask the important questions. Today I accompany tech professionals to find their path with clarity and purpose. Because the best technology is built by people who know themselves.

journey.title: My Path: From Code to People

phases.title: From code to conversations
content: I started writing code at 3am, passionate about finding the perfect solution. PHP, MySQL, complex architectures... I always moved forward: from full-stack development to technical leadership, from Product Owner to transforming complete organizational cultures.
I never stopped. But along the way I discovered something more powerful than the perfect framework: the impact of accompanying tech people to find their purpose.

Today I no longer code in PHP or JavaScript, but I'm still the same committed innovator. Only now my code is conversations that transform teams, my deployment is helping leaders grow, and my best architecture is building cultures where people flourish.

phases.title: Real challenges aren't in the code
content: As a Tech Lead I discovered something: the best code doesn't transform if the person writing it doesn't feel connected.
Talented developers without spaces to grow. Product Owners without vision clarity. Teams without real conversations.
That's where my search began: I studied coaching, agility, facilitation, conscious leadership.
I became certified in ICF Coaching, Management 3.0, Scrum, Lean... seeking answers beyond code.

phases.title: When success isn't enough
content: At 35, I stopped. I was leading teams, important projects, recognition... but something was missing.
Nights asking myself: Am I building what really matters?
That pause was uncomfortable and necessary. It led me to professional coaching, honest conversations, to ask myself who I was without the title.
I discovered that many share this feeling. That understanding became my starting point.

phases.title: From technology to people
content: I worked 18+ years in tech (Peru, LATAM, U.S.). I led digital transformations, agile teams, scalable products.
But what gave me the most meaning were the mentoring conversations with someone seeking their path.
Seeing someone connect with their purpose in a session was worth more than any technical milestone.
Every time someone said "this conversation gave me clarity", I felt I was contributing something real.

phases.title: HugoTech: sharing what I've learned
content: HugoTech was born from a question: How to accompany without money being an obstacle?
I decided that 1-to-1 sessions would be 100% free. Not as a strategy, but as a commitment.
If today I can accompany someone, it's because others did the same for me at key moments.
This space is my way of giving back what I received and building with purpose.

evolution.title: 18+ years transforming (and being transformed)
evolution.subtitle: From writing my first line of code to leading cultural transformations in high-performance teams

phases.title: Backend Developer ‚Üí Love for architecture
phases.description: I started with PHP, MySQL, MVC architectures. I built systems from scratch: e-commerce platforms, ERPs, ticketing systems for transportation. I learned that clean code isn't just syntax, it's empathy with whoever comes after.

phases.title: Frontend Developer ‚Üí Experience matters (and I'm passionate about it)
phases.description: I discovered that the interface is where users feel the product. JavaScript, React, animations, performance, accessibility. It wasn't enough for it to work, it had to feel good, flow, excite. UX became my obsession: understanding every click, every microinteraction, every loading second. I fell in love with creating experiences people love to use.

phases.title: Full Stack Developer ‚Üí See the complete picture + Growth
phases.description: I brought both worlds together: backend architecture + frontend experience. Now I could see the complete product, understand trade-offs, make technical decisions thinking about the business. But it wasn't enough to build well: I discovered my passion for digital marketing and growth. Analytics, conversion, funnels, A/B testing. Every line of code was an opportunity to grow the business.

phases.title: Tech Lead & Product Owner ‚Üí Code isn't enough
phases.description: I led teams, defined roadmaps, negotiated with stakeholders. But here I discovered the truth: the best products are born from aligned and motivated teams. Perfect code wasn't enough if people didn't have clarity, purpose or spaces to grow.

phases.title: Country Manager ‚Üí Data-Driven culture and strategic vision
phases.description: I managed operations in Peru coordinating development, marketing, call center, sales and talent management teams. I learned that success isn't just in the product, but in aligning multiple areas toward a common goal, measuring impact with KPIs and OKRs. I became obsessed with building a data-driven culture: every decision backed by data, every strategy validated with metrics. I understood that people are the most powerful strategy, and data is their best ally.

phases.title: Digital Strategist & Agile Coach ‚Üí Transform people and cultures
phases.description: Today my code is conversations that transform teams. My deployment is helping leaders find their voice. My best architecture is building cultures where people flourish and talent becomes real impact. I no longer code in JavaScript, but I keep innovating: now in human development.

evolution.quote: From backend code to leading countries. From managing KPIs to transforming cultures. I'm still an innovator, only now my language is people.
evolution.author: Hugo Casanova, 18+ years of continuous evolution

mission.title: What I do today
mission.content: I accompany tech professionals in their personal and professional transformation. I offer 100% free 1-on-1 sessions for those who need them, and corporate programs that transform teams with agility, innovation and a growth mindset. From self-awareness to conscious leadership, from purpose to action with impact.

vision.title: Where I'm going
vision.content: I want to be a reference in human transformation in Latin American tech. Create a community of conscious leaders who lead with empathy, build products with purpose, and transform the industry through innovation with soul.

philosophy.quote: First know yourself. Then build with meaning.
philosophy.description: I learned that first comes self-knowledge (who I am), then purpose (why I do it), and finally results come as a natural consequence.
philosophy.footer: Success without inner clarity becomes fragile over time.

header.title: Stories from those who <highlight>walked with me</highlight>
header.description: Beyond the results, these are the people who trusted me. Who dared to share their fears, their doubts and also their dreams. Each path was different, but all share the same beginning: that moment where they decided they wanted something different for their professional and personal life.

list.title: Stories of those who walked with me
list.description: Since I was 22, I've had the opportunity to lead teams. I made many mistakes, but I learned something fundamental: true leadership is bringing out each person's potential. These are the talents who dared to think differently, to take risks, to develop their soft skills and empower themselves to build their own extraordinary version.

end.title: You've seen all the stories
end.description: {count} people who dared to trust, to look within and to grow.
end.cta_text: Would you like to be part of these stories?

hero.title: We transform technology teams <highlight>from BEING</highlight> to high performance
hero.subtitle: At Hugotech we accompany companies looking for much more than improving processes: they seek to transform people, cultures and teams.
hero.description: Because true innovation doesn't start with technology, but with those who create it.

proposal.title: üß≠ Our proposal for companies
proposal.description: Hugotech Companies was born to accompany technological and digital organizations that want to elevate the human, technical and cultural level of their teams. We combine agility, coaching, mentoring and Lean thinking to activate purpose, collaboration and excellence in daily work.
proposal.subtitle: We work from three complementary dimensions:

dimensions.title: Culture and Mindset
dimensions.description: We design immersive workshops and experiences that awaken awareness, align values and connect people with the organization's purpose.
items: Organizational culture programs and transformation of BEING

dimensions.title: Development Teams and Technical Agility
dimensions.description: We accompany technical and product teams to evolve towards high-performance teams, strengthening their practices, structure and synergy.
items: Technical and cultural accompaniment (4 to 6 month programs)
Liberating structures, design thinking and continuous learning

dimensions.title: One-to-One Mentoring and Coaching
dimensions.description: Individual processes designed to enhance leadership, self-management and mental clarity of each team member.

personal_learning.badge: üíî I Learned It The Hard Way
personal_learning.title: I'm not selling you theory. I'm sharing scars.
personal_learning.paragraph1: I led brilliant teams that collapsed due to lack of clarity. I saw senior developers resign not because of salary, but because of lack of purpose. I was that leader who prioritized the sprint over people... until the team fell apart.
personal_learning.paragraph2: That experience transformed me. Now I help other leaders not make the same mistakes I did. Because I know what it feels like to see a team break. And I know what it feels like when you rebuild it from the soul.

cases.title: üöÄ Transformation cases: from good teams to extraordinary teams

challenges.title: We have accompanied technology teams facing common challenges:
list: Fragmented communication between technical and business roles
Emotional overload and resistance to change
Disconnection between purpose, task and result

items.description: code review, architecture, database, agile practices and team synchrony.

items.title: Culture and Agility Workshops:
items.description: collective sessions to awaken awareness, vulnerability and shared purpose.

items.title: Applied Tuckman Model
items.description: (Forming‚ÄìStorming‚ÄìNorming‚ÄìPerforming): real measurement of group evolution.

items.title: Transformation of BEING:
items.description: each member rediscovers who they are, what motivates them and how they can contribute value from their authenticity.

results.title: ‚ú® Visible results
items: More aligned, conscious and collaborative teams.
Technical leaders who communicate from empathy and clarity.
Greater fluidity in decision making and technical execution.
Culture of continuous improvement: from "doing to comply" to "doing with purpose".

philosophy.title: üß† Our philosophy
philosophy.quote: "I'm not selling magic formulas. I'm selling 18 years of falls, recoveries and painful lessons."
philosophy.description: Real transformation hurts, makes uncomfortable, questions. But it's the only one that lasts.
philosophy.belief:
We believe that high performance is not imposed, it is awakened.
Each company has its own rhythm, energy and essence.
We only accompany the process: we challenge, guide and sustain change from empathy and experience.
philosophy.quote2: "True change occurs when people stop working only for goals and start working from purpose."

steps.description: We explore the current culture, technical challenges and invisible tensions that slow growth.

steps.title: Process design
steps.description: We co-create a comprehensive plan with workshops, 1:1 sessions, technical or cultural support, according to team needs.

steps.title: Activation
steps.description: We execute sessions, dynamics and accompaniments with focus on real transformation, not theoretical.

steps.title: Measurement and evolution
steps.description: We evaluate the technical and cultural maturity of the team with visual tools and periodic feedback.

items.text: We combine technology and humanity in each intervention.
We unite agility, coaching and mentoring in one language.
We accompany with real presence, not just consulting.
We turn processes into learnings and people into leaders.
We foster a culture of safe innovation where mistakes are learning and the team proposes fearlessly.

2.title: New perspectives

3.title: Concrete action plan

4.title: Deep self-awareness

5.title: Renewed confidence
5.description: Strengthen your personal security and lead your career with authenticity and purpose.

6.title: Sustainable transformation
6.description: Integrate learnings that generate lasting changes in how you think and act.

items.2: Leaders who want to develop a more conscious and human leadership style
items.3: People in professional transition who need clarity about their next move
items.4: Talents who feel they've lost their purpose and want to reconnect with their essence
items.5: Those who want to work on specific topics: confidence, communication, decision-making, or balance

quote.text: It's not about having all the answers, but asking the right questions to discover them.
quote.author: Hugo Casanova

hero.title: 1-on-1 Coaching
hero.subtitle: A safe space to explore who you are, discover your potential, and design the life you truly want to live

whatIs.title: What is Coaching?
whatIs.description: Coaching is a process of accompaniment where YOU are the protagonist. I don't give you answers, I help you discover them. Through powerful questions, deep reflection, and active listening, I guide you to find your own path to your goals and your best version.

1.title: Self-awareness
1.description: Discover who you are beyond your professional roles

2.title: Goal clarity
2.description: Define what you really want and why it's important to you

3.title: Conscious action
3.description: Design concrete steps aligned with your values and purpose

benefits.title: What will you achieve with Coaching?
benefits.subtitle: Real transformations that impact all areas of your life

1.title: Reconnect with your essence
1.description: Reconnect with who you really are, your values, and what deeply moves you.

2.title: Mental clarity
2.description: Eliminate mental noise and make decisions from a place of awareness and security.

3.title: Balance and well-being
3.description: Find balance between your personal and professional life without sacrificing your well-being.

4.title: Overcome your limitations
4.description: Identify and transform limiting beliefs that have been holding you back for a long time.

5.title: Authenticity
5.description: Live and act from your true self, without masks or external expectations.

6.title: Life purpose
6.description: Define your purpose and build a life with meaning and clear direction.

items.1: People who feel they're living on autopilot and want to regain control
items.2: Those seeking to reconnect with their purpose and live with more authenticity
items.3: Professionals who want to balance professional success with personal well-being
items.4: People in moments of transition: career change, relationships, new life stages
items.5: Those who want to work on self-awareness, confidence, emotional management, or decision-making

coaching.title: 1-on-1 Coaching
coaching.description: Focused on BEING: who you are, what you want, and how to achieve it from your essence. It's introspective, deep, and transformative.

topics.1: You seek self-awareness and personal transformation
topics.2: You want to work on balance, purpose, or well-being
topics.3: You face important decisions or life transitions

mentoring.description: Focused on DOING: your career, professional goals, and how to take the next step. Combines coaching with my experience in tech and leadership.

topics.1: You seek clarity in your tech career and next steps
topics.2: You want to develop leadership or communication skills
topics.3: You need strategic guidance and professional action plan

quote.text: Coaching is not about changing who you are, but about remembering who you've always been under all the layers you've built.
quote.author: Hugo Casanova

hero.title: Coaching with a Cause üåçüíö
hero.subtitle: Your professional growth gives back to the world.
hero.tagline: The first session is free. It's to get to know each other, discover your purpose, and see if we connect. If you decide to continue, each session costs S/35 soles (~USD $10) that does NOT go to my pocket: it goes 100% to social causes that need support.

freeCommitment.title: Why do I do this?

1.text: Life gave me a lot: opportunities, learnings, people who believed in me. This is my way of giving back.

2.text: I work with young tech talents who are just starting. I don't want money to be a barrier, but I also don't want the process to be free. When we invest something (even if it's small), we value it more.

freeCommitment.principle: The model is simple: your investment gives back to the world while you grow as a professional.

1.title: First session: Free, no commitment
1.description: We take 45 minutes to get to know each other. We explore together what you're looking for, what your challenges are, where you want to go. If at the end you feel we don't connect or this isn't for you, no problem. There's no obligation to continue.

2.title: Second session onwards: S/35 soles per session
2.description: If you decide to keep working together, each session costs S/35 soles (about USD $10). It's affordable for young tech talents just starting out. That money does NOT go to my personal account: it goes directly to a 'solidarity fund' destined for NGOs and social causes.

3.title: Your contribution creates real impact
3.description: Every quarter I share public reports showing exactly which organizations received donations, with receipts and evidence. It's not marketing: it's total transparency. Your growth gives back to the world in a concrete way.

causes.title: The causes we support
causes.subtitle: Each session you book multiplies your impact in these four areas:

1.title: Rescued animal shelters
1.description: Shelters like 'Huellitas de Amor' and 'ASPPA' that provide home, health, and love to abandoned dogs and cats in Lima and provinces.

2.title: Tech education for vulnerable communities
2.description: Programming, design, and digital skills workshops in rural and peripheral areas of Peru, opening doors to new opportunities.

3.title: Community kitchens and soup kitchens
3.description: Support for mothers and families who feed entire communities with daily effort and dedication in needy neighborhoods.

4.title: Reforestation in the Peruvian Amazon
4.description: Environmental conservation projects to protect our forests, native communities, and unique biodiversity.

investment.title: S/35 soles that transform two lives
investment.subtitle: Yours and someone who needs it
investment.quote: It's not about charging for the sake of charging. It's about your investment in yourself also helping others.

pricing.distribution: 100% goes to solidarity fund for NGOs
pricing.breakdown: Distributed among 4 causes: approximately S/8.75 for each

1.title: We promote responsible adoption
1.description: Rescued animal shelters doing their best with little. Your contribution helps with food, vaccines, and sterilizations.

2.title: Tech education for kids without resources
2.description: Programming workshops in vulnerable areas. Scholarships, laptops, and internet access for young people dreaming of a better future.

transparency.title: Transparency without excuses
transparency.description: Every 3 months I publish a report showing:

items.1: How much money was collected in the solidarity fund?
items.2: Which NGOs or causes received donations?
items.4: Photos and testimonials from organizations that received support

transparency.commitment: I keep nothing. This isn't a business: it's a way to give back while I accompany you in your growth.

free.title: üéÅ Schedule Your First Free Session
free.subtitle: First discovery session ‚Äî 100% free, no commitments

withCause.title: üíö Second Session and Continuity
withCause.subtitle: From 2nd session onwards: S/35 soles that go 100% to social causes

finalMessage.text: Growing as a professional and giving back to the world aren't separate things. They can go together.
finalMessage.author: Hugo Casanova

impact.title: Real Impact in Real Time
impact.subtitle: Every session you take generates concrete change. Here you can see exactly where every sol goes.
